ValidationRule.description: This validation rule will fire when status picklist is in "Escalated". This is created in custom_case object for Task dated on 10-12-2020
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Escalated"), OR ( LEN( Text_Field_1__c )=0, LEN( Text_Field_2__c )=0, Check_box_1__c = FALSE, Check_box_2__c = FALSE) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter values for Text box 1;Text box 2 ;check box 1 and check box 2
